quote_first: ‘Are you on your own, miss?’  It was a stupid question and it annoyed her. There were a lot of cross answers she could have snapped out, but she swallowed them and just said, ‘Yes.’  ‘Waiting for the
quote_last:
, are you?’
‘Is there any other?’
‘Well, no. Not this time of night.’
title: The Clockwork Crow
author: Catherine Fisher
